entry.title: Champagne Problems
entry.summary:
Author: spideytorches

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,139Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 132

Summary: A hand approaches Clark's chest, where his messily done tie is taken out of his loose suit and into the billionaire's fingers. Wayne pets it like it's some kind of cat, then gives a decent tug that Clark has to consciously remember that he is not, in fact, an unmovable object at the moment.He finds his face inches away from the host of the Gala currently ravaging the place downstairs, who stares deeply into Clark's eyes like he’s trying to find something important.“I– I um– I-It's Kent, Clark Kent, actually– I was just– uh… Bathroom?” Clark attempts, stupidly, earning a sparkle from Wayne's faded eyes.“Silly,” Wayne murmurs, an airy chuckle coming with his fingers tracing up Clark's tie, and he almost expects the man to take him by the shoulders and push him out of the room. Instead, delicate fingers wrap themselves around the garment, starting to untie it completely. “Does this look like a bathroom to you?”

entry.title: Space love
entry.summary:
Author: Speechless_since_1998

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,519Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 226

Summary: "It means that a dangerous criminal has taken refuge on your planet, and currently his plans are unknown."It wasn't Hal Jordan who spoke, nor one of the other Lanterns. Instead, it was a man a little younger than Batman who appeared behind the Green Lanterns, dressed in a blue and red suit, with a cloak on which there was a pin to stop him from the characteristic S-shape.The man's eyes were blue, not Bruce's icy color, but more like Dick's, warm, gentle, and when he smiled, he had a dimple on his left cheek. He moved confidently and calmly, like someone who is used to entering a room and being heard."With a look like his, it doesn't have to be difficult," he thought absently.-----Overworked, without a real love life, and with Dick in full teenage rebellion, the last thing Bruce needs is to have to babysit the powerful alien the Lanterns have brought to the Watchtower.But Kal El has his ways of breaking down all Bruce's barriers.

entry.title: Spectrums of Color and a Face in Common
entry.summary:
Author: RenkonNairu

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,012Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 624

Summary: Earthlings don't see color until they make eye-contact with their soulmates for the first time.But Kryptonians say your soulmate will resemble you. You look like you belong in the same House.Batman encounters reporter Clark Kent, their eyes meet through the cowl and Bruce can see color for the first time.Clark can't help but noticed that, to spite being from different planets, Bruce Wayne looks a lot like him. Bruce Wayne must be his soulmate! Superman keeps showing up in Gotham to try and speak to Bruce.But Bruce knows his soulmate is that rando nobody of a reporter from the Daily Planet and has no time for the alien's romantic overtures.

entry.title: Marigolds
entry.summary:
Author: Gurdis_XXIV

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 105,642Chapters: 52/?Kudos: 99

Summary: Bessie Brown lost everything in one night. Her parents vanished, she was far from home, and she had no choice but to eek out a living on the streets of Gotham. Fortunately, she found a partner-in-crime, Jason Todd. That is, until he disappears too. When she finds him again, it changes everything. Welcomed into a new family, she has choices to make about who she is, who she wants to be, and who she will become. She also has new relationships to consider. She only knows one thing for sure: she will never be alone again.This is a long-term romance story with mystery and action subplots, covering some canon events, but it is its own AU, so not all events follow canon.
